thread.title: Atlanta United reports more than 30,000 season tickets sold
thread.title_full: Atlanta United reports more than 30,000 season tickets sold

author: Doug Roberson
title: Atlanta United reports more than 30,000 season tickets sold
text:
Atlanta United has surpassed 30,000 season tickets sold for its inaugural season in MLS.
The club announced the sales total Thursday. The amount extends what the team said is a record for an expansion team’s first season in MLS.
Atlanta United will open the regular season against New York Red Bulls on March 5 at Georgia Tech’s Bobby Dodd Stadium.
The club has sold more than 40,000 tickets for that game.
Atlanta United will play Charleston on Saturday in its final exhibition game.
A few thousand season tickets remain on sale.
